org.springframework.util

类 CommonsLogWriter

      • org.springframework.util.CommonsLogWriter
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Closeable, Flushable, Appendable, AutoCloseable

    public class CommonsLogWriter
extends Writer
    java.io.Writer adapter for a Commons Logging Log.
    从以下版本开始:
    2.5.1
